posts.post_content:
Ok now that I've got all my pending Old Mill Southern Leaguers in hand, it's time to try this again...

1) I am looking to downgrade the first two cards pictured here, Carey and Perdue. I am looking for a 1-2 grade, and would be open to either cash or cards to make up the difference.
2) The Reagan pictured here is a dupe. I am looking to trade it for something I need. This card is ranked #9 on the scarcity list for the ENTIRE 524 set!

Here is the list of what I still need:
Bay
Bernhard
Lipe
McCauley
Rockenfeld
Smith, Sid
Violat 

Let's make a deal!
